Parameters: String: the JAR file entry name
Throws: if the entry name is null
if the entry name is longer than 0xFFFF bytes.
JarEntry(java.lang.String).Description: Creates a new JarEntry for the specified JAR file entry name.

Returns: the Certificate objects for this entry, or null if none.
getCertificates().Description: Returns the Certificate objects for this entry, or null if none. This method can only be called once the JarEntry has been completely verified by reading from the entry input stream until the end of the stream has been reached. Otherwise, this method will return null. The returned certificate array comprises all the signer certificates that were used to verify this entry. Each signer certificate is followed by its supporting certificate chain (which may be empty). Each signer certificate and its supporting certificate chain are ordered bottom-to-top (i.e., with the signer certificate first and the (root) certificate authority last).

Returns: the Manifest Attributes for this entry, or null if none
Throws: if an I/O error has occurred
getAttributes().Description: Returns the Manifest Attributes for this entry, or null if none.

JarEntry(java.util.jar.JarEntry).Description: Creates a new JarEntry with fields taken from the specified JarEntry object.

Parameters: ZipEntry: the ZipEntry object to create the JarEntry from
JarEntry(java.util.zip.ZipEntry).Description: Creates a new JarEntry with fields taken from the specified ZipEntry object.

Returns: the CodeSigner objects for this entry, or null if none.
getCodeSigners().Description: Returns the CodeSigner objects for this entry, or null if none. This method can only be called once the JarEntry has been completely verified by reading from the entry input stream until the end of the stream has been reached. Otherwise, this method will return null. The returned array comprises all the code signers that have signed this entry.

ClassDesc: This class is used to represent a JAR file entry.
